attributes.action: Answer the Questions in 'Prime Ministers Questions' with a straight answer!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As our governmental system is based on constituency representation, its is vital to our democratic process that the Prime Minister should be open, honest and succinct when addressing the house and nation during Prime Ministers Questions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
